articles.author: Wale Odunsi
articles.title: China’s military drills around Taiwan upset US - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: The United States has asked China to stop "provocative" actions around Taiwan as tension heightens. The American government accuses the fellow world power of aggravation through its military drills. The White House said China's efforts "to change the status q…
articles.content:
The United States has asked China to stop “provocative” actions around Taiwan as tension heightens.
The American government accuses the fellow world power of aggravation through its military drills.… [+955 chars]
